messages.subject: Guns and Dogs
messages.msgSnippet: I have never met a mean Pit Bull . Ever.  And I ve met many.  I think it depends on whether they grow up in a house with guns, live on the east coast or  west
messages.messageBody:
I have never met a mean Pit Bull . Ever. And I've met many. I think it
depends on whether they grow up in a house with guns, live on the east
coast or west coast, rural or urban, public school or homeschool. Or
maybe it's just about learning to be nice.

I'll take the little boy across the street with his toy six shooter any
day over the monster next door who likes to pull the legs off
grasshoppers. The guy with the toy isn't hurting anyone. Parents make
all the difference, guns or no guns.
Deb L
